content: cherryfield wrap crochet pattern by tara briggs @taralovescrochet cherryfield wrap - april 2021 - downeast collection basic information pattern is written in us crochet terms yarn dk or light worsted weight about 750 yards i used ella rae marmel in the color mystic quartz hook 5mm fit one size fits most finished size 64 long without fringe and 15-16 wide gauge 15 sts by 7 row = 4 in pattern after blocking abbreviations and symbols chain - chain skip - skip st - stitch space - space fdc - foundation double_crochet optional double_crochet - double_crochet * * - repeat this section cherryfield wrap - april 2021 - downeast collection notes - when working the crossed stitches always work in front of the sts just made - stitch counts are given at the end of each row in - chain 2 at the beginning of a round does not count as a stitch - for a wider or narrower wrap increase or decrease foundation row by multiples of 2 sts pattern row 1 fdc 60 or chain 62 double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook and across 60 row 2 chain 2 turn double_crochet in 1st st *chain 1 skip 1 st double_crochet in next st* across until last st double_crochet in last st 60 row 3 chain 2 turn double_crochet in each st and chain space across 60 row 4 chain 2 turn double_crochet in 1st st *skip 1 st double_crochet in next st double_crochet in skip st* across until last st double_crochet in last st 60 row 5 chain 2 turn double_crochet across 60 repeat row 2 through 5 26 more times or until 1 shorter than desired length row 110 repeat row 2 60 row 111 repeat row 3 60 - fasten_off - block using your preferred method i personally like wet blocking to open up the stitches and get great drape - weave in ends cherryfield wrap - april 2021 - downeast collection optional fringe -cut 120 10 pieces of yarn -fold 1 piece in half use hook to pull loop through a stitch on the end row pull the ends of the piece through the loop -repeat in each stitch on both ends of the wrap -block fringe i used steam blocking and trim the ends to equal length enjoy your new wrap cherryfield wrap - april 2021 - downeast collection thank you so much for making my pattern please tag me @taralovescrochet on instagram and use the hashtags #cherryfieldwrap #downeastcollection and #taralovescrochet visit my instagram page here https //www instagram com/taralovescrochet/ for more patterns check out my ravelry store https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/tara-briggs- ravelry-store _________________________________________________ here are some photos from my amazing testers check them out on instagram too @cloud_design_crochet @yarns_intertwined @stephanie_makes @mamankay_crochet @softball151 cherryfield wrap - april 2021 - downeast collection
